CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL( OTP_Generate_For__c ,'Channel Partner'), 'CP Name: ' + Prospect__r.Channel_Partner__r.Name, IF( ISPICKVAL( OTP_Generate_For__c ,'Temp Channel Partner'), 'CP Name: ' + Prospect__r.Temp_Channel_Partner__r.Name, ' ' ) )
/*IF(ISPICKVAL( OTP_Generate_For__c ,'Channel Partner'), 'Channel Partner Name:' + Prospect__r.Channel_Partner__r.Name,' ' )*/
CustomField.label: Channel Partner Name
